name: Lottery Game (ElephantTooth)
description:
Choose the right book from the right bookshelf on the right floor from the right building to win the lottery:

  • Control the player with arrows keys or WASD
    • Up arrow or W key to go forward
    • Down arrow or S key to go backward
    • Left arrow or A key to rotate left
    • Right arrow or D key to rotate right
  • Select from 69 rows and 69 columns of buildings in the Overworld
    • Move to a door on one of the buildings
    • Enter the building by touching the door
  • Select from 69 floors in the Lobby
    • Move to the elevator at the end
    • Type what floor to go to
  • Select from 69 rows and 69 columns of bookshelves in the Library
    • Move to a bookshelf in the room
    • Take a closer look at the bookshelf by touching it
  • Select from 25 books on the Bookshelf
    • Hover over and select a book using the mouse
    • The win-or-lose condition pops up depending on if the book is correct

Note: The web page must be refreshed to restart the game
